author: wtopstaff
title: Red Wings-Canucks Sums
text:
0 0—2 
First Period_1, Vancouver, Tanev 1 (Burrows, Hutton), 13:03 (pp). Penalties_Edler, Van (holding), 9:43; Nyquist, Det (hooking), 11:32. 
Second Period_2, Vancouver, Sutter 3 (Burrows, Horvat), 8:02 (pp). Penalties_Hamhuis, Van (hooking), 1:31; Sheahan, Det (high-sticking), 3:54; Ericsson, Det (tripping), 6:35; McCann, Van (tripping), 8:50. 
Third Period_3, Detroit, Pulkkinen 4 (Tatar, Smith), 4:25. 4, Detroit, Tatar 2 (Kronwall, Zetterberg), 6:59 (pp). Penalties_Weber, Van (high-sticking), 6:05; Kindl, Det (interference), 9:30; Edler, Van (holding), 10:56. 
Overtime_5, Detroit, Nyquist 4 (Mrazek), 3:50. Penalties_D.Sedin, Van (tripping), :13. 
Shots on Goal_Detroit 7-4-12-5_28. Vancouver 10-13-7-2_32. 
Power-play opportunities_Detroit 1 of 6; Vancouver 2 of 4. 
Goalies_Detroit, Mrazek 2-2-0 (32 shots-30 saves). Vancouver, R.Miller 3-2-3 (28-25). 
A_18,312 (18,910). T_2:38. 
Referees_Dan O’Rourke, Brad Watson. Linesmen_Ryan Galloway, Ryan Gibbons. Topics:
